Text.Language: Ten[ici m~mo y~mau m~piouwini n~tav~m/i: ten]w~ou ne w~ y/eyouab ouoh m~macnou]: je a~remici nan m~p~cwt/r m~pikocmoc t/rf: afi~ ouoh afcw] n~nen'u,/:
We exalt you, the Mother of the true Light. We glorify you, O saint, the Theotokos, for you have brought forth unto us the Savior of the whole world; He came and saved our souls.

ouw~ou nak penn/b penouro P,#c#: p~sousou n~nia~poctoloc: pi,~lom n~te nimarturoc: p~yel/l n~nidikeoc: p~tajro n~nie~kk~l/cia: p~,w e~bol n~te ninobi:
Glory be to You, our Master, our King, Christ, the pride of the apostles, the crown of the martyrs, the joy of the righteous, the firmness of the churches, the forgiveness of sins.

tenhiwis n~]t~riac eyouab: ecqen oumeynou] n~ouwt: tenouwst m~moc: ten]wou nac. Kurie ele/~con: Kurie ele/~con: Kurie eulog/con: a~m/n.
We proclaim the Holy Trinity in one Godhead. We worship Him. We glorify Him. Lord have mercy. Lord have mercy. Lord bless us. Amen.
